text: Lonely Ballet (孤單芭蕾) is an album by Taiwanese pop singer Evonne Hsu, released in 2002. ==Track listing== #孤單芭蕾 Gu Dan Ba Lei (Lonely Ballet) #忽然很想你 Tu Ran Hen Xiang Ni(Suddenly Missing you) #學會 Xue Hui (Understand) #特別來賓 Te Bie Lai Bin (Special guest) #Keep It Up #大手拉小手 Da Shou La Xiao Shou (Big Hand Holding Little Hand) #魚兒水中游 Yu Er Shui Zhong You(Fishes swims in water) #Lay Your Love #幸福的味道 Xin Fu De Wei Dao (The Taste of Blessedness) #連接 Lian Jie (Connection) ==Personnel== *Evonne Hsu (vocals) Category:Evonne Hsu albums Category:2002 albums
title: Lonely Ballet
